biotools.summary: Discriminative pattern finder capable of using a very large negative set to greatly improve its predictive power. It is capable of handling sequences that are not repeat masked given that the negative set is a representative sample of promoters from the organism examined.

bioschemas.name: MoAn
bioschemas.summary: Discriminative pattern finder capable of using a very large negative set to greatly improve its predictive power. It is capable of handling sequences that are not repeat masked given that the negative set is a representative sample of promoters from the organism examined.
